Class MeasurementsDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.enaikoon.android.service.opencellid.library.db.MeasurementsDatabase

  • public class MeasurementsDatabase
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Used to insert cell measurements.
    Author:
    Marcus Wolschon (Marcus@Wolschon.biz), Roberto, Danijel

      • addMeasurement

        public void addMeasurement(Measurement pMeasurement,
                  boolean storeMeasurement,
                  boolean storeNetwork)
        Insert a new register in the Measurement table. Uses transactions to sinchronize the networks table with any new results from the measurement
        Parameters:
        pMeasurement - the meassurement to add
        storeMeasurement - if false, only the listeners are informed
        storeNetwork - if true, network will also be stored

        public MeasurementsTable.MeasurementsDBIterator getAllMeasurementsForTimeRange(long from,
                                                                      long to)
        Returns all measurements for the specific time frame.
        Parameters:
        from - time in milliseconds passed from 00:00:00 1-1-1970
        to - time in milliseconds passed from 00:00:00 1-1-1970
        Returns:
        a DBIterator on all retrieved records
